businessProcessAnalysis.description: Find relevant SAP services for process analysis
Analyze process for bottlenecks and optimization opportunities

performanceOptimization.description: Execute optimized query to validate improvements

check-sap-authentication.description: Check authentication status and validate user session for SAP operations. Call this FIRST at the start of conversations to avoid authentication interruptions.
check-sap-authentication.requirement: Recommended as first step in new sessions

parameters.validateSession: true (default) - Whether to validate existing session
parameters.context: Optional context for session type and anticipated operations

nextSteps.ifAuthenticated: Proceed with any SAP tool without interruption
nextSteps.ifNotAuthenticated: Complete authentication flow, then continue with workflow

sap-smart-query.description: Single entry point for ALL SAP queries with intelligent routing. Automatically analyzes requests and routes to optimal tools.
sap-smart-query.requirement: Use for any SAP request when unsure which specific tool to use
examples: show me customers from last month

parameters.userRequest: Your request in natural language or direct query
parameters.context: Optional context with serviceId, entityType, previousTools

nextSteps.reason: Smart router provides optimal workflow sequence based on request analysis

search-sap-services.description: Search and filter available SAP OData services by name, category, or keyword. Use first to find relevant services.

parameters.category: business-partner | sales | finance | procurement | hr | logistics | all
parameters.limit: Maximum number of services to return (default: 10)

nextSteps.reason: After finding services, explore their entities

discover-service-entities.description: List all entities and their capabilities within a specific SAP service. Use after finding a service.

parameters.serviceId: The SAP service ID to explore
parameters.showCapabilities: true (default) - Show CRUD capabilities for each entity

nextSteps.reason: After discovering entities, get detailed schema or start operations

get-entity-schema.description: Get detailed schema information for a specific entity including properties, types, keys, and constraints.

parameters.entityName: The entity name within the service

nextSteps.reason: After understanding schema, use it for operations or query building

natural-query-builder.description: Convert natural language requests into optimized SAP OData queries
examples: show me customers from last month
analizza business partner creati di recente

nextSteps.reason: Use generated OData query to retrieve actual SAP data

execute-entity-operation.description: Execute exact OData queries on SAP entities
execute-entity-operation.warning: Use ONLY with precise OData syntax, not natural language

smart-data-analysis.description: Analyze SAP data using AI for trends and insights
smart-data-analysis.requirement: Use AFTER getting data from execute-entity-operation
examples: Analyze retrieved business partner data for trends
Generate insights from customer purchase patterns

business-process-insights.description: Analyze SAP business processes to identify bottlenecks, inefficiencies, and optimization opportunities using AI
business-process-insights.requirement: Requires historical process data - use after execute-entity-operation to get process transactions
examples: analizza colli di bottiglia nel processo

parameters.processType: procurement | sales | finance | inventory | hr | general
parameters.processData: Array of historical process execution data from SAP

nextSteps.recommended: No additional tools needed - provides complete analysis
nextSteps.reason: business-process-insights is a terminal analysis tool that provides comprehensive recommendations

query-performance-optimizer.description: Analyze and optimize SAP OData queries for better performance using AI recommendations
query-performance-optimizer.requirement: Use when queries are slow or need optimization
examples: optimize slow queries in the system

commonMistakes.example: Instead of 'execute: show customers' ‚Üí use natural-query-builder

commonMistakes.solution: Execute query first to get data
commonMistakes.example: First get data with execute-entity-operation, then analyze
